title: Android 13 DP1 updates Privacy dashboard with optional longer data retention
content:
Last year’s release of Android 12 included a new Privacy dashboard, which compiled all permissions requests from all the apps on your device into a readable format. Android 13 is on the way, and even though there aren’t many changes in the first Developer Preview, one of them might make the Privacy dashboard even more

The post Android 13 DP1 updates Privacy dashboard with optional longer data retention appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The first Developer Preview of Android 13 includes an option to store Privacy dashboard for even longer than is possible on Android 12.
